request.apisix.yaml:
routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /*
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "127.0.0.1:9001": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END

routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /anything
    plugins:
      response-rewrite:
        body: '{"message":"Hello from APISIX!"}'
        headers:
          content-type: application/json
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "httpbin.org:80": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END

routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /headers
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "httpbin.org:80": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END

routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /specific-path
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "httpbin.org:80": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END

routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /headers
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "httpbin.org:80": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END

consumers:
  - username: tom
    plugins:
      key-auth:
        key: secret-key

routes:
  - id: 1
    uri: /ip
    plugins:
      key-auth: {}
    upstream:
      nodes:
        "httpbin.org:80": 1
      type: roundrobin
#END
